column5: I guess I will start off by saying Merry X-mas to everybody.  I started fishing when I was about 5 years old( which was quiet a while ago), I fished with my Dad and we fished for just about everything that swam.  As I got older I  float fished more and more and had a lot of fun going to different spots around the Great Lakes.    I got into Fly Fishing and tying flies.  I  fly fished for a while I still like to get out and go for Bass and pike on the fly.  But recently I started to cast lures with a Baitcasting rod. I guess Now I need to find the right boat.  Anybody looking for any fly stuff?  Cheers..
Welcome to the show! Lots of boat info here if that's what you're looking for, though I don't have any.
I am trying to find something that will handle rivers and lakes.. but still has a shallow draft...?
Welcome onboard Bunker,  good luck finding your boat...hope ya get what ya need....now put those thoughts of boating away somewhere safe and get icefishing man!  but seiously...lol...WELCOME
Welcome to the loony bin.  Got any pics?
welcome aboard Bunker....  your signature line tells me that you are gonna fit right in here bro

thanks everyone ...  I had alot of pics on my Computer But I lost my hard drive to a virus back in August  Just before My Daughter was born and I was never able to retrieve anything so I have to start over with the hole picture thing again.   oh well serves me right for not backing them up..
fyi..... alot of use www.photobucket.com to upload pics here...
